subtasks: Start forging tool shanks.
Cut blades using a plasma machine.
Prepare metal for welding by forging, welding, and cleaning.
Cup trowels and bend them.
Cool tools after forging steps.
Heat treat tools to harden edges and maintain ductility.
Allow tools to develop a protective patina through use.
Run a plasma machine for cutting metal.
Manage tool forging and welding processes.
Conduct heat treating of metal products.
Maintain a YouTube channel and interact with viewers.
Include product links in video descriptions.
Encourage viewers to check out another homesteader's channel.
